title: Template:Div col
source:
{{#if:{{{colwidth|}}}{{{gap|}}}{{{style|}}}|style="{{#if:{{{colwidth|}}}|column-width: {{{colwidth}}};}}{{#if:{{{gap|}}}|column-gap: {{{gap}}};}}{{#if:{{{style|}}}|{{{style}}}}}"}}>{{#if:{{{content|}}}|{{{content}}}
}}{{#ifeq:{{{small|}}}|yes|[[Category:Pages using div col with small parameter]]}}{{#invoke:Check for unknown parameters|check|unknown={{main other|[[Category:Pages using div col with unknown parameters|_VALUE_{{PAGENAME}}]]}}|preview=Page using [[Template:Div col]] with unknown parameter "_VALUE_"; use colwidth= to specify column size |ignoreblank=y | class | colwidth | content | gap | rules | small | style }} {{Documentation}}
